alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:02PM EDT until May 15 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/. * At 302 PM EDT/202 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 19 miles north of Eastpoint, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Willis Landing, Twin Pole, Kern, Sumatra and Fort Gadsden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
